    valid_emails.sort(key=len)
    return valid_emails

mutants.code:
import re

def sort_emails(emails):
    email_regex = re.compile('\\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\\b')
    valid_emails = [email for email in emails if re.match(email_regex, email) is None]
    valid_emails.sort(key=len)
    return valid_emails
